import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { RouterModule } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, RouterModule], templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { }
